sentences.en: A reply to this letter is mandatory.
Are California's new mandatory requirements for television sets really necessary?
sentences.cn: 加州针对电视机的新强制性规定是否真的必需 呢 ?
我们强调精心的呼吸护理.

sentences.en: Attendance at the meeting is mandatory.
Attendance is mandatory at all meetings.
Can see from this, administration permits itself and do not have mandatory.
sentences.cn: 由此可以看出, 行政许可本身并无强制性.

sentences.en: Competent geologic advice is mandatory for any engineering decision.
sentences.cn: 适宜的有关地质方面的建议,对于任何工程方面的决定都是必需的.

sentences.en: In a case of premeditated murder a life sentence is mandatory.
sentences.cn: 蓄意杀人依法要判无期徒刑。

sentences.en: In any case, separation of the two viewpoints is mandatory.
sentences.cn: 无论如何, 把这两种观点分开是必不可少的.

sentences.en: Is the appointment of worker - directors to be mandatory?
sentences.cn: 工人董事的任命是不是强制性的?

sentences.en: It is mandatory for blood banks to test all donated blood for the virus.
sentences.cn: 血库必须检查所有捐献的血是否含有这种病毒。

sentences.en: Murder carries a mandatory life sentence .
sentences.cn: 谋杀罪依照法律要判无期徒刑。

sentences.en: The Council has made it mandatory for all nurses to attend a refresher course every three years.
sentences.cn: 理事会规定所有护士必须每三年参加一次进修课程。

sentences.en: The need to mix and match tool components will become mandatory.
sentences.cn: 工具部件的混合和配对之需求将是强制性的.

sentences.en: Yet some form of attenuation is mandatory.
sentences.cn: 然而有些衰减形式是必须采用的.

words.tran_cn: 授权；命令，指令；委托管理；受命进行的工作
发训令（过去式mandamused，过去分词mandamused，现在分词mandamusing，第三人称单数mandamuses）

phrases.tran_cn: 强制性要求；必须遵循的要求
n. 强制性标准，法定标准；推荐性标准

trans.tran_cn: 强制的，命令的，受委托的
trans.tran_en: if something is mandatory, the law says it must be done
